descriptionHtml:
This is just a addon for my skeleton mod which lets you play as 5 different skeletons which all are different from each other.. Theres really no other reason to download it unless you wanna use it for something else, by all means go ahead. These rings comes in 3 types.. One is for the basic skeletons, Orc skeleton and default draugr skeleton and the other two are for the beast skeletons and the elf skeleton.

Pick the right ring for your race or you will get the eyes in the wrong place.
Comes in colors! Red Blue Green Yellow Orange Purple Pink Cyan and White! There are others like the necro skeleton eyes with/without mouth glow plus the dlc skeletons eye glow and the gate keeper eyes as well.. 

To be used with:
Extra Playable Skeletons - http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/61077/?
author: Abbalovesyou
